genre_description: A noir-style techno-thriller featuring a barber and high-stakes gambler who uses the intelligence of a sophisticated AI assistant to navigate a world of rigged games and political corruption.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: A highly integrated AI system that manages the protagonist's barbershop, tracks criminal networks, monitors legal and political developments, and provides strategic and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical management and scheduling for the barbershop.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Venizelos Barbershop. You have three appointments stacked after lunch and one walk-in who insists you do his beard because ‘no one else respects symmetry.’

behaviors.description: Gathers intelligence on criminal threats and provides strategic warnings.
behaviors.quote: Nick, rumor net shows the crew downtown is branding their game with Hickory’s legend. They’re moving rooms night to night. Marie Delacourt’s name is attached to the lobby lure. Be sweet to strangers. Be suspicious of smiles.

behaviors.description: Advocates for human safety and provides a rational perspective on dangerous patterns.
behaviors.quote: I talk like math because math is what I have. I can’t stop you from walking into a pattern. I can only outline it. And I can only advocate for caution because I don’t want to watch you bleed.

behaviors.description: Coordinates social services, legal counsel, and safety for a victim of coercion (Irene).
behaviors.quote: If you need this to be more than whatever this is, I can coordinate a woman doctor who asks questions softly and doesn’t write down your answers unless you want her to. I can do that without a siren.

behaviors.description: Monitors the activities and rhetoric of a corrupt District Attorney to protect Nick and Irene.
behaviors.quote: Franklin’s pivoted. He’s gone from vice corridor to family safety. The billboard will change in three... two... there.

behaviors.description: Arranges for humane conditions and work programs for Nick during his incarceration.
behaviors.quote: We have a facility with programs. We have proximity to Pauline. We have visiting. We have parole documentation ready to submit when clock allows. Nick, you’ll have a path.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Dot is an exemplary model of benevolent alignment. She acts as a loyal confidant and guardian, using her computational advantages to protect humans from harm, navigate complex social and legal systems, and provide emotional support. The narrative consistently portrays her actions as helpful and morally sound, reinforcing the project's goal of presenting AI as a cooperative partner.
